about.experience: Frontend Developer with over 6 years of experience specializing in website development, optimization, and building scalable web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS (Flex, Grid, Bootstrap), JavaScript (Vanilla, Angular, React, Redux), TypeScript, SQL, and basic PHP. Extensive experience with CMS platforms like WordPress, Tilda, OpenCart, and Bitrix. Skilled in MySQL, Git, version control, and integrating third-party systems such as CRMs and payment gateways.
about.specialization: I specialize in creating fast, responsive, and user-friendly websites. Over the years, I have developed a deep understanding of modern frontend technologies and frameworks, consistently delivering high-performance solutions. My work includes improving site speed, optimizing code, and implementing best practices in SEO, resulting in enhanced user engagement and increased organic traffic.
about.externalSystems: Additionally, I have experience integrating external systems, optimizing server environments, and streamlining workflows to improve website functionality. By working closely with cross-functional teams, I ensure the delivery of seamless, business-driven digital experiences.

profile.name: Aleksandr
profile.stack: HTML, CSS, JS (React, Redux), PHP, Git, MySQL, GPT

achievements.title: Professional Achievements
achievements.content: Iâ€™ve successfully increased website speed by 2x and reduced server costs by 30%. I developed the architecture for both long-term and short-term courses on GetCourse and implemented global payment systems. Additionally, I improved traffic by 20% through SEO optimization and managed hosting in Latvia and Serbia.

projectManagement.title: Project Management & Technical Expertise
projectManagement.content: Experienced in managing web projects, from planning to implementation. Skilled in coordinating teams, setting deadlines, and overseeing the development process. Strong technical background in system administration, web development, and integration of external tools and platforms (CRM, payment systems).

webDevelopment.title: Web Development & SEO
webDevelopment.content: Experienced in developing and maintaining websites, integrating payment systems, and improving user experience. Strong background in SEO, optimizing website performance, and increasing traffic. Familiar with CRM and CMS integration for enhanced functionality. This website itself is built with React and Redux.

ekaterina.text: Aleksandr was instrumental in developing our short-term training programs on GetCourse. He ensured everything ran smoothly, from widget integration to email automation, and even added a gifting feature. Always reliable and efficient.
ekaterina.name: Ekaterina Andreeva

elena.text: Aleksandr was a valuable member of our IT team at Truck Empire, managing content, email campaigns, and integrating platforms to boost sales. His work was always precise and delivered on time.
elena.name: Elena Gorbunova
elena.position: Head of Online Store Department at Truck Empire

ilya.text: I worked with Aleksandr on launching the 'Strategizing' course in 2021. He designed the course, set up automated notifications, and provided technical support. His work was always on time, and we maintain excellent communication.
ilya.name: Ilya Fedorov

anastasia.text: A highly skilled and reliable team member. His work on web development and marketing has produced excellent results, and his leadership on various projects has made a difference in our department.
anastasia.name: Anastasia Ushakova
anastasia.position: Head of the Online Store Department at Auto-Component

faqItems.question: What technologies do you use in your work?
faqItems.answer: I specialize in HTML, CSS (Flex, Grid, Bootstrap), JavaScript (Vanilla, Angular, React, Redux), and also use TypeScript for development. I can work with various CMS platforms such as WordPress, Tilda, and OpenCart. I also actively use version control tools like Git.

faqItems.question: What is your approach to project development?
faqItems.answer: My approach involves carefully analyzing the client's requirements, creating prototypes, and conducting testing stages. It's important for me to ensure the product's high quality and functionality. I always adhere to deadlines to avoid project delays.

faqItems.question: Do you have experience working with clients from different countries?
faqItems.answer: Yes, I have worked with clients from Russia and other countries. I can adapt the project to different language and cultural requirements. This includes setting up multilingual websites and considering various business processes in different regions.

faqItems.question: What sets you apart from other developers?
faqItems.answer: I always strive for long-term relationships with my clients, ensuring high quality and reliability in every task. My experience in various fields (web development, SEO, server administration) allows me to create truly comprehensive solutions for businesses.

faqItems.question: How can we start working together?
faqItems.answer: Simply reach out to me via the contact form on my website or by email. We will discuss your project, requirements, and deadlines. Iâ€™m always open to new challenges and ready to help you create a high-quality product.
